title: Update On Redemption Of USD 400 Million Perpetual Subordinated Capital Securities ('Bonds') Issued By UPL Corporation Limited, Mauritius, A Wholly Owned Subsidiary. 28 May - UPL subsidiary redeemed USD 400 million perpetual subordinated bonds on May 28, 2025.
